room_title: Escape room "Amazon Rainforest" by International Room Escape AZ in Phoenix
room_description: You and your team of researchers have recently made tremendous strides in the ﬁeld of gene therapy. Deep within the Ecuadorian rainforest you discovered a miraculous rose that some believe could extend a person’s life indeﬁnitely. However, trouble ensues on the ﬂight home and you are forced to make a crash landing. Your crew makes it out safely, but the roses are gone.  Now you have one hour to exit the plane, ﬁnd the roses and make it to the rescue coordinates. Work fast and together, or the secret to immortality will be lost... forever...
